Detailed Description

Common definitions and functions to manipulate a color image, providing three samples (color channels) for each pixel.

◆ Luminosity()

sImage32 * gft::CImage::Luminosity ( sCImage *  cimg)

Changes an image from RGB to grayscale.

The luminosity method works best overall and is the default method used if you ask GIMP to change an image from RGB to grayscale
